questions.questionText: What are runtime permissions in Android?
questions.correctAnswer: Permissions that must be requested from the user at runtime (Android 6.0/API 23+).
questions.explanation: Improve privacy by letting users decide at runtime.

questions.questionText: What is the difference between normal and dangerous permissions?
questions.correctAnswer: Normal permissions are granted at install. Dangerous permissions require runtime approval.
questions.explanation: Dangerous permissions may affect user privacy/data.
